comments.author: paul@mozilla.com
comments.text:
When we run this demo: http://animatable.com/demos/madmanimation/ (click on "watch"), the CSS Animations cause xorg to use 100% of the CPU.

Link to the CSS: http://animatable.com/demos/madmanimation/css/animation-moz.css
comments.creator: paul@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
When we run this demo: http://animatable.com/demos/madmanimation/ (click on "watch"), the CSS Animations cause xorg to use 100% of the CPU.

Link to the CSS: http://animatable.com/demos/madmanimation/css/animation-moz.css

comments.text:
Do you not get 100% CPU usage if you just make corresponding style changes from script?

It really sounds like a graphics or buggy driver problem, not a style system problem....
comments.raw_text:
Do you not get 100% CPU usage if you just make corresponding style changes from script?

It really sounds like a graphics or buggy driver problem, not a style system problem....
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
paul@mozilla.com
comments.text:
You are right: just tested with another GPU (intel), it works well.
With nvidia, 100%.
